subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Callahan, Brian Boyle and Anton Stralman, all former Rangers, have helped keep the Tampa Bay Lightning near the top of the Eastern Conference, and on Monday they will face their old team for the first time.
snippet: Ryan Callahan, Brian Boyle and Anton Stralman, all former Rangers, have helped keep the Tampa Bay Lightning near the top of the Eastern Conference, and on Monday they will face their old team for the first time.
